Text: It is {special:days} {plural:day:days} since the Moonprince rode forth into the Icemark.
{char:name} has recruited {number:%d} %s from {char:loc:name}. {case:first}{number:%d} %s now guard the {char:loc:terrain:name}. {char:text:army}
{char:name} has placed {number:%d} %s on guard at {char:loc:name}. {case:first}{number:%d} %s now guard the {char:loc:terrain:name}. {char:text:army}
{case:first}{char:loc:obj:name} are abroad and {char:gender:heshe} must fight or hide.
The evil Shareth has won victory!
After {special:days} {plural:day:days} the warriors of Midnight return to the frozen gates.
{lf}{crlf}{cr}The Watchwords of Midnight are revealed!{lf}{crlf}{cr}'The brave and the free fear no foe.{lf}{cr}Forth, mighty hosts of Midnight!{lf}{cr}Unto death or victory we go!'
{char:longname} has an army of %s warriors and %s riders.
.{lf}{crlf}{cr}  The bloody sword of battle brings death in the Domain of {loc:area:text}
, "The %s, can be found in the hands of {char:longname}."
{char:shortname} sees the %s and an underground entrance.
{char:longname} places the {obj:text} on {char:gender:hisher} head, the power contained within brings all lords loyal to the Moonprince to {char:gender:himher}.
{char:longname} casts the {obj:text} and {char:gender:heshe} is magically transported to be with Morkin.
{char:longname} throws the {obj:text}, all lords loyal to the Moonprince are refreshed and envigorated.
{char:longname} uses the {obj:text} and {char:gender:heshe} now feels refreshed and envigorated.
